name: Selfless
description:
Developed for Spring Game Jam 2020.

Solo Developer

Team Name: GuardianOfThebes

Non-Original Items include:

Megascan Ground Snow
Polygon Town Pack (Main Char and 6 units for buildings, trees, some props for set dressing and road pieces, A vehicle)

Reactive water pack

Animstarter kit animations and Mannequin standard animations.
